size.description: Change the size of the component.

label.description: Button label. Has priority over default slot.

icon-left.description: Icon from NovaIcon library. Is right after the 'before' slot.

icon-right.description: Icon from NovaIcon library. Is right before the 'after' slot.

icon-size.description: Size of icons in CSS units.

background-color.description: Background color in Nova colors or CSS units.

text-color.description: Text color in Nova colors or CSS units.

ripple.description: Disable material ripple by setting it to 'false'.

default.description: Default slot can be used as label, unless 'label' prop is specified.
